thread.title_full: Exclusive Offer Club reviewed by jammedByJoe

author: jammedByJoe
title: jammedByJoe
text:
To be clear.
This is not a lawful transfer of ownership of the software.
If you lack ethics and/or technical skill to pirate, then this might be the way to go for you.
You will get a Serial Number, that will be, in no way unique to you.
It will not be supportable via Adobe.
